column1: # CSV Template for Phone Price Estimator
This CSV file is used to import device and attribute data into the Phone Price Estimator plugin.
Below is an explanation of each column:
- The base price of the device (e.g.
- The discount type for the attribute option.
- The label for the attribute option (e.g.
- The discount value associated with the option (e.g.
- *(Optional)* The ID of the attribute that this option belongs to.
